title: Owner information
description: Various unrelated fields that should be preserved for backwards-compatibility reasons. See also trait_source.

id.description: The machine-readable unique identifier of the organization whose database this content is stored in. In Arc, this is equivalent to ARC_ORG_NAME.

name.description: Human-readable name of original producer of content. Distinguishes between Wires, Staff and other sources. See also trait_source.type and trait_source.name

sponsored.description: Necessary for including/excluding advertorial and native content in search results, story card features.
